page.title: 10 THE CYCLING PROFICIENCY
page.content: On Monday the first of July we did our cycling proficiency test. We were tested by a policeman his name is P.C.Dunn. At first I thought I would not do it but I did. We did our cycling test around our village. The policeman watched us as we rode our bikes on the road. After everyone had done that we went round the cones in the playground. We also had road signs and questions to do.Some of them were harder than others but I did all of them and got 3 wrong. Then P.C.Dunn said that we had all passed. BY EMMA GREEN.
